00019 void MyTimerFunction(void)
00020 {
00021         // Clock output on pin 2 of PORTE: 
00022     if(tick2==0)
00023     {
00024                 SetOutput(PORTE,PIN_2);
00025         tick2=1;
00026         }
00027     else
00028     {
00029                 ClearOutput(PORTE,PIN_2);
00030         tick2=0;
00031         }

00035 int main(void)
00036 {
00037         UInt8 tick;
00038         UInt8 portb;
00039         UInt8 porte;
00040         UInt8 portf;
00041         UInt8 portg;
00042 
00043         // Set io as default
00044         portb = IO_AS_DEFAULT ;
00045         portf = IO_AS_DEFAULT ;
00046         portg = IO_AS_DEFAULT ;
00047 
00048         // Set pin2 and pin7 of PORTE as output (the other pin are set as input by default)
00049         porte = (IO_AS_OUTPUT << PIN_2) | (IO_AS_OUTPUT << PIN_7 ); 
00050 
00051         // Finally, write the i/o configuration:
00052         SetIOWay(portb, porte,portf,portg);
00053 
00054         // Init timer overflow to 7.5 ms
00055         Timer1Init(50536,TIMER1_8);
00056 
00057         tick2=0;
00058 
00059         // Attach a function to timer1
00060         Timer1AttachFunction(MyTimerFunction);
00061 
00062         tick=0;
00063         while(1)
00064         {
00065                 // Wait an overflow of timer:
00066         if( IsTimer1Overflow() == 1 )
00067         {
00068                         // Clock output on pin 7 of PORTE: 
00069             if(tick==0)
00070             {
00071                                 SetOutput(PORTE,PIN_7);
00072                 tick=1;
00073                         }
00074             else
00075             {
00076                                 ClearOutput(PORTE,PIN_7);
00077                 tick=0;
00078                         }
00079         }
00080 
00081         }
00082 
00083         return 0;
00084 }
